title: Faith Without Borders: A Devotional to Inspire You to Step Out in Faith.
description: Librarian Note: See Alternate Cover Edition HERE.Virginia Martin's heartfelt, personal testimony in her debut book, Faith Without Borders, describes God's powerful influence in her life. It is an inspirational book of devotions, uplifting words of wisdom, and scriptural references that are sources of strength and encouragement. Faith Without Borders is a devotional for those starting out, wondering about Christianity, lost or struggling along their path. It encourages you to step out in faith, so that God can meet you in all the places that you need him.
author: Virginia  Martin
